duties_responsibilities.duty: Research and develop analytical and AI-driven medical image reconstruction, registration, synthesis, and segmentation techniques for image-guided radiotherapy.
Develop statistical and AI-driven models for phase-resolved, dynamic, and real-time CT/MR imaging and anatomical motion.
Create algorithms and workflows for image-guided adaptive radiation therapy for proton and photon treatments.
Develop automatic quality assurance techniques for MR-guided adaptive radiotherapy using MR-LINACs.
Design dual-model, dynamic, and anthropomorphic phantoms through 3D printing and casting.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Physics, Electrical Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or related disciplines
